entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a person who is gloating over Harry. He is mentioned as having a voice from overhead.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being rolled over onto his back and interrogated by Greyback.

entities.name: scabior
entities.description: Scabior is a person mentioned as someone that Greyback tells to check the list.

relationships.description: Greyback interrogates Harry, asking him what happened to him.
Greyback instructs Scabior to check the list.
